name: RuneCraft RPG
description:
Craft hundreds of unique spells by combining runes with elements and modifiers! Fight mobs and bosses in a variety of biomes and challenge crypts. Inspired by Diablo and other action RPGs.

Support us on Patreon to play ($1 access coming soon)

Note this demo is no longer in development. Play our current project, Sherwood Extreme, for free on Steam!
